content: Has anyone figured out yet how to open the Zoom link for the hangout through the Whova App...?
Tapping the link in the session description takes me to a list of Zoom meetings. Tapping the link of the Wrap Up/Hang Out session in that list brings me back to the session description...
I can't even c&p the link to open it in another app...
I would really like to NOT have to type in the Meeting ID an Password manually into Zoom :laughter_tears:
@Simone Heckmann Indeed. It's a limitation of Whova. That's why we always try to post the Zoom link for these sessions in the chat too.
